ygData.subject: RE: black chestplates
ygData.msgSnippet: Where does the charred guardian plate come from?  How hard would it be for a level 35ish group to obtain? Elwyn Heartstring 36 Bard Erollisi Marr ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Where does the charred guardian plate come from? How hard would it be for a
level 35ish group to obtain?


Elwyn Heartstring
36 Bard
Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Arwen [mailto:arwen@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 26, 1999 12:24 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] black chestplates


From: "Arwen" <arwen@...>

In response to your question the charred breastplate has a deep dull
charcoal look to it. I have it, the boots, and the gloves. ( last nite I
turned down rubicite gloves in fact to keep my charred. The 4 points better
of ac did NOT in my opinion offset the dex boost i got from charred!)

Elyana Silvanae
Bard of the 36th chourus
Ambassador to the Ridgerunners
Innoruuk Server
